card.name: Abduction

card.name: Sea Monster
card.text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Sengir Autocrat
card.text: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens onto the battlefield. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

card.name: Serenity
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Serra's Blessing
card.text: Creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Shatter
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shatterstorm
card.text: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Sibilant Spirit
card.text: Flying Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.

card.name: Skull Catapult
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Sky Diamond
card.text: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Snake Basket
card.text: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Soldevi Sage
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.

card.name: Soul Net
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spell Blast
card.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

card.name: Spirit Link
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Spitting Drake
card.text: Flying {R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Stalking Tiger
card.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Staunch Defenders
card.text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Storm Cauldron
card.text: Each player may play an additional land during each of his or her turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Strands of Night
card.text: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Stream of Life
card.text: Target player gains X life.

card.name: Stromgald Cabal
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.

card.name: Stupor
card.text: Target opponent discards a card at random, then discards a card.

card.name: Sulfurous Springs
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

card.name: Sunweb
card.text: Defender Flying Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Svyelunite Temple
card.text: Svyelunite Temple enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Syphon Soul
card.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Tariff
card.text: Each player sacrifices the creature he or she controls with the highest converted mana cost unless he or she pays that creature's mana cost. If two or more creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one.

card.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Terror
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: The Hive
card.text: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp onto the battlefield.

card.name: Thicket Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Throne of Bone
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

card.name: Tranquil Grove
card.text: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.

card.name: Tranquility
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Tundra Wolves
card.text: First strike

card.name: Uktabi Orangutan
card.text: When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Uktabi Wildcats
card.text: Uktabi Wildcats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate Uktabi Wildcats.

card.name: Underground River
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Unseen Walker
card.text: Forestwalk {1}{G}{G}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Unsummon
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Unyaro Griffin
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Unyaro Griffin: Counter target red instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Vampiric Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Vertigo
card.text: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Vitalize
card.text: Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Volcanic Geyser
card.text: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Waiting in the Weeds
card.text: Each player puts a 1/1 green Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each untapped Forest he or she controls.

card.name: Wall of Air
card.text: Defender, flying

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.text: Defender {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wand of Denial
card.text: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Warmth
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a red spell, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Warrior's Honor
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Growth
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Wind Spirit
card.text: Flying Wind Spirit can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Wooden Sphere
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Worldly Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wyluli Wolf
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Zombie Master
card.text: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.text: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
